Room.Name: Adventures Unlimited Treasure Maps and Accessories
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the famous (or infamous) Treasure Maps and Accessories Shop.
Room.LongDescription: Adventures Unlimited is a franchise service which buys and sells treasure maps and other artifacts for the treasure hunter. Although they have a reputation for being reputable, no one has ever seemed to survive long enough to find the treasure they claim to have bought a map to. Whether or not treasure exists probably depends on the skill of the purchaser, and not the reputability of the seller.
